title: Annotation Instance
description: Representation of an annotation instance and its parameters

x.description: Visual X coordinate of this annotation in the model

y.description: Visual Y coordinate of this annotation in the model

grid_height.description: Manually defined visual height in grid-space units.

grid_width.description: Manually defined visual width in grid-space units.

color_id.description: ID corresponding to a color definition for the background of the annotation.

label_position.description: Visual location of the annotation's label
